Llynfi Valley Angling Association

About Us

Established in 1954, the Llynfi Valley Angling Association has become an important part of the Maesteg Community. Following its creation, the Association has prospered and continues to grow, gaining new members each year.

Newsletter Sign Up Form

The River

The River Llynfi, otherwise referred to as the Llynfi River or Afan Llynfi in Welsh, is one of three main tributaries of the River Ogmore or Afan Ogwr.

Herons, dippers, wagtails and plenty of fish reside in the clean waters of the Llynfi in South Wales.

Membership

The LVAA 2025 season begins on March 3rd until September 30th. (No spinning until July 1st).
